channel.title: ESSAY on Hitoshi Takeuchi's Site
channel.description: Recent content in ESSAY on Hitoshi Takeuchi's Site

item.title: Poetry
item.description: Introduction Poem There are three dimensions Ｘ, Y and Z Like a game engine Then later you hear there’s a fourth dimension Quaternion Like a game engine Then some say there can be five, six, seven… I knock off work Between mathmatics and emotion Like a rolling stone
